author: chirino
msg: Added svn ignores and updated pom.

author: hogstrom
msg: Removed Distributed Map options from config and changed default to Direct from EJB

author: dblevins
msg: Switched the packaging plugin from 1.0-SNAPSHOT to 1.1.0.  Subsequent versions in trunk will be 1.1.1 and 1.1.2, etc.

author: chirino
msg: - We now use DiscoveryAgentFactory implementations to create the DiscoveryAgent (so it can be more flexible on how it used the discovery usi to configure the agent).
- using the discovery:tcp://localhost syntax when binding a transport seemed fishy.  a transport now support a discoveryUri property that can be configured like "multicast://groupname"
- You can now programaticaly configure the embedded broker that the vm connection factory starts up.
- Peer switch to using explicity configuration of the embedded broker.
